class.name: OpenXRSpatialContextPersistenceConfig
class.description: Configuration header for spatial persistence. Pass this to [method OpenXRSpatialEntityExtension.create_spatial_context] as the next parameter to create a spatial context with spatial persistence capabilities.

method.name: add_persistence_context
method.description: Adds a persistence context to this configuration. You must add at least one persistence context to create a valid configuration. You can create a persistence context by calling [method OpenXRSpatialAnchorCapability.create_persistence_context].
